text: Night of Champions was a professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) show made by WWE. It took place on on September 16, 2012 at TD Garden in Boston, Massachusetts. It was the fifth Night of Champions event held by WWE. The main event was a match between WWE Champion CM Punk and John Cena. The end of match saw Cena place Punk on the top rope and hit a bridging German suplex for the pin. The referee declared that both men had their shoulders on the mat for three seconds and ended the match in a draw. ==Results== ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Night of Champions 2012 website Category:2012 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Boston Category:WWE Night of Champions Category:2012 in the United States Category:2010s in Boston Category:September 2012 events
title: Night of Champions (2012)
